description: Checks the availability of the given service namespace across all Azure subscriptions. This is useful because the domain name is created based on the service namespace name.

subscription_id.description: Gets subscription credentials which uniquely identify Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.

sku.description: The sku of the created namespace

isavailiable.description: True if the name is available and can be used to create new Namespace/NotificationHub. Otherwise false.
